title: Need help read description please
body:
Does anyone know where I can buy Online EUW Gift Cards because I heard that NA ones don't work and I cant switch servers because my card doesn't work on the EUW servers because its an American card or something I really don't know why it doesn't work on EUW and I need to switch and there's really no way I can so if someone could please switch me over or tell me where to buy Online EUW cards that would be awesome
,Thanks!

replies.body: I'm not sure about online venues for EUW, but we'd like to help out and see if we can do anything with your current RP card.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help out.  We'll reach out asap!
Heya! There's an RP option to use non-RP cards such as Subway or Burger King on NA, not sure if it's the same stores on EU, but you could try purchasing some of those instead, maybe.
